message: Let's divide it fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you. We both get a good amount, and we avoid losing value due to inflation.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, as it's closer to an even split.  Let's avoid unnecessary risk of losing money to inflation and end the game on a good note.
I'm willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle between my initial 60/40 offer and your 55/45 offer. This way, we both get a decent share, and we can stop losing value to inflation.
